verses.verse: תִּמְשֹׁ֣ךְ <S%H4900><s%> tim-Shoch Canst thou draw out לִוְיָתָ֣ן <S%H3882><s%> liv-ya-Tan leviathan בְּחַכָּ֑ה <S%H2443><s%> be-chak-Kah; angle וּ֝בְחֶ֗בֶל <S%H2256><s%> u-ve-Che-vel, with a cord תַּשְׁקִ֥יעַ <S%H8257><s%> tash-Ki-a' [which] thou lettest down לְשֹׁנֽוֹ׃ <S%H3956><s%> le-sho-No. his tongue

הֲתָשִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> ha-ta-Sim Canst thou put אַגְמ֣וֹן <S%H100><s%> ag-Mon an hook בְּאַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> be-'ap-Po; his nose וּ֝בְח֗וֹחַ <S%H2336><s%> u-ve-Cho-ach, bramble תִּקּ֥וֹב <S%H5344><s%> tik-Kov pierce לֶֽחֱיוֹ׃ <S%H3895><s%> le-che-yo. his jaw

הֲיַרְבֶּ֣ה <S%H7235><s%> ha-yar-Beh Will he make many אֵ֭לֶיךָ <S%H413><s%> 'E-lei-cha about תַּחֲנוּנִ֑ים <S%H8469><s%> ta-cha-nu-Nim; supplications אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Or יְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber unto thee;will he speak אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to you רַכּֽוֹת׃ <S%H7390><s%> rak-Kot. soft

הֲיִכְרֹ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> ha-yich-Rot Will he make בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit a covenant עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach; will you תִּ֝קָּחֶ֗נּוּ <S%H3947><s%> tik-ka-Chen-nu, with thee;wilt thou take לְעֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> le-'E-ved him for a servant עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. alway

הַֽתְשַׂחֶק־ <S%H7832><s%> hat-sa-chek- Wilt thou play בּ֭וֹ bo כַּצִּפּ֑וֹר <S%H6833><s%> katz-tzip-Por; A bird וְ֝תִקְשְׁרֶ֗נּוּ <S%H7194><s%> ve-tik-she-Ren-nu, bind לְנַעֲרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5291><s%> le-na-'a-ro-Tei-cha. damsel

יִכְר֣וּ <S%H3738><s%> yich-Ru dig עָ֭לָיו <S%H5921><s%> 'A-lav over חַבָּרִ֑ים <S%H2271><s%> chab-ba-Rim; Shall the companions יֶ֝חֱצ֗וּהוּ <S%H2673><s%> ye-che-Tzu-hu, of him;shall they part בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> bein among כְּֽנַעֲנִֽים׃ <S%H3669><s%> Ke-na-'a-Nim. Canaanite

שִׂים־ <S%H7760><s%> sim- Lay עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and כַּפֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3709><s%> kap-Pe-cha; thine hand זְכֹ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> ze-Chor upon him remember מִ֝לְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah, the battle אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- shall not תּוֹסַֽף׃ <S%H3254><s%> to-Saf. do no more

הֵן־ <S%H2005><s%> hen- Behold תֹּחַלְתּ֥וֹ <S%H8431><s%> to-chal-To Behold the hope נִכְזָ֑בָה <S%H3576><s%> nich-Za-vah; of him is in vain הֲגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> ha-Gam even אֶל־ <S%H408><s%> 'el- nay מַרְאָ֣יו <S%H4758><s%> mar-'Av even at the sight יֻטָֽל׃ <S%H2904><s%> yu-Tal. shall not [one] be cast down

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- No אַ֭כְזָר <S%H393><s%> 'Ach-zor None [is so] fierce כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki dares יְעוּרֶ֑נּוּ <S%H5782><s%> ye-'u-Ren-nu; to arouse וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> u-Mi Who ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he לְפָנַ֥י <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai before יִתְיַצָּֽב׃ <S%H3320><s%> yit-yatz-Tzav. who then is able to stand

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who הִ֭קְדִּימַנִי <S%H6923><s%> Hik-di-ma-ni Who hath prevented וַאֲשַׁלֵּ֑ם <S%H7999><s%> va-'a-shal-Lem; me that I should repay תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim [him;whatsoever is] under the whole heaven לִי־ li- הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who גִ֭לָּה <S%H1540><s%> Gil-lah Who can discover פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei the face לְבוּשׁ֑וֹ <S%H3830><s%> le-vu-Sho; apparel בְּכֶ֥פֶל <S%H3718><s%> be-Che-fel [to him] with his double רִ֝סְנ֗וֹ <S%H7448><s%> ris-No, bridle מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo. come

גַּ֭אֲוָה <S%H1346><s%> Ga-'a-vah [are his] pride אֲפִיקֵ֣י <S%H650><s%> 'a-fi-Kei brook מָֽגִנִּ֑ים <S%H4043><s%> ma-gin-Nim; scales סָ֝ג֗וּר <S%H5462><s%> sa-Gur, shut up together חוֹתָ֥ם <S%H2368><s%> cho-Tam seal צָֽר׃ <S%H6862><s%> Tzar. [as with] a close
